content: The build # I attempted to use wordpress for years. It always felt clunky and unintuitive. And it never looked “right.” It was so slow to use, to update, making it utterly useless. Made the decision to move away from wordpress. I tackled Framer. After a day of learning their platform and falling in love with the GUI I discovered their pricing model. It’s disgusting. HUGO # I would have never imagined that I would use something like Hugo. Mainly because I don’t know coding. I took a shot at it and was extremely impressed. Using Claude I’ve managed to code this entire site. I had ideas and they were brought to life with this workflow.

content: 7 string guitar is a different animal. A friend of mine told me the best way to learn how to use it, is to write music with it. Between gain and compression I got a nice and nasty tone. Also messing around with a recording set up that involves no editing.
